InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

Size: 1

InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: GUARD
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Don’t be afraid to go up against the unknown with Seal Corp’s GUARD. This shield generator balances performance, durability, and stealth to allow the user to utilize the shield in whatever way suits them best.

InstalledItem.Name: Sedulity
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

When you need a power plant that’s as reliable as you are, then snag yourself a Sedulity. This component has been a staple of the Juno Starwerk line for years, making it truly worthy of the name.

InstalledItem.Name: Sedulity
InstalledItem.Description:

InstalledItem.Name: Snowfall
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

Few things can be as damaging to your ship over time as excess heat build up. The Juno Starwerk Snowfall cooler helps ensure that your ship stays the right temperature for longer, which means that you can keep flying for longer.

InstalledItem.Name: Torrent
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whatever destination you choose, the ArcCorp Torrent quantum drive is a solid choice to help get you there direct and hassle-free.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
